original_title: Searching For Sasquatch 7: The Night Stalkers
overview: Jason Kenzie and the Bigfoot group T.A.A.P.S. journey deep into the Colorado Rockies searching for evidence of these reclusive cryptids. The team makes the most of daylight by looking for tree breaks, footprints, and other signs of Bigfoot.
title: Searching For Sasquatch 7: The Night Stalkers
